name: Space Walk (Lumine Noctis)
description:
"While you were... uh, napping, I detected a malfunction in the main rocket's fuel gauge system. You are required to go outside to inspect it and make any necessary repairs."

-----------------------------------------------

'Space Walk' is a short game developed over the course of one week, as part of the course 'Game-A-Week'. 

The given theme for this project was 'Physics'. 

Credits

Miro Kroslin

Martin Bremer 

Martina Marchio 

Voice Actor

Maximlien Luc Proctor

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
